bug.author: AptX395
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Question</denchmark-h>
I'm running a simple code follow the documentation of Stable-Baselines3. But I meet an error. I've searched this error, and I still don't know how to solve it. The following is a screenshot of the specific situation. What caused it? <denchmark-link:https://camo.githubusercontent.com/dba9a673fbe65355230132229226b721504cc6958882b4e38d85d68991441d06/68747470733a2f2f692e6c6f6c692e6e65742f323032302f31322f32352f384d497032576d46504358753633692e706e67></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Checklist</denchmark-h>
I have read the documentation (required) I have checked that there is no similar issue in the repo (required)

comments.comment: DQN does not support continuous action spaces, and would not work with Pendulum-v0 environment. See docs on supported environments.

DQN does not support continuous action spaces, and would not work with Pendulum-v0 environment. See docs on supported environments.
Thanks for your reply! My code is exactly the same as the sample code in the document, but it can't work properly, which really confuses me. The link of example is <denchmark-link:https://stable-baselines3.readthedocs.io/en/master/modules/dqn.html>https://stable-baselines3.readthedocs.io/en/master/modules/dqn.html</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://camo.githubusercontent.com/4e1f66222992075e80f8e063f624064f63f9ca07876c89b1c99e170111f4cd22/68747470733a2f2f692e6c6f6c692e6e65742f323032302f31322f32362f78486c3750675a706935753954764c2e706e67></denchmark-link>
Thank you for your help!
Ooh good catch! That indeed is wrong and should be CartPole-v0, not Pendulum-v0. A PR that fixes this issue would be welcomed :)

Ooh good catch! That indeed is wrong and should be CartPole-v0, not Pendulum-v0. A PR that fixes this issue would be welcomed :)
Haha, I'll commit a PR. üëç
